name: terra-button
description: The terra-button component provides users a way to trigger actions in the UI.
author: Cerner Corporation

scripts.compile: npm run compile:clean && npm run compile:build
scripts.lint: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:scss
scripts.release:major: npm test && npm run compile && npm version major -m "Released version %s" && npm publish && git push
scripts.release:minor: npm test && npm run compile && npm version minor -m "Released version %s" && npm publish && git push
scripts.release:patch: npm test && npm run compile && npm version patch -m "Released version %s" && npm publish && git push
scripts.test: npm run test:spec && npm run test:nightwatch-default
scripts.test:all: npm run test:nightwatch-default && npm run test:nightwatch-chrome && npm run test:nightwatch-firefox && npm run test:nightwatch-safari
scripts.test:nightwatch-safari: npm run test:nightwatch-safari-tiny && npm run test:nightwatch-safari-small && npm run test:nightwatch-safari-medium && npm run test:nightwatch-safari-large && npm run test:nightwatch-safari-huge && npm run test:nightwatch-safari-enormous
